description.full: (ONLINE INTERACTIONS NOT RATED BY THE ESRB)  Unlock the full version of Blacklight: Tango Down and experience the bleeding edge of advanced warfare. Fight tomorrow’s conflicts with or against your friends in the gritty Blacklight universe.  Make your stand across seven game modes with 12 different maps in intense online battles supporting up to 16 players. Or fight through four intense Black Ops missions co-operatively or alone; all the while gaining experience, collecting stats, and unlocking items.  Earn new weapon attachments and items, improve your abilities, and engage your Hyper Reality Visor to locate enemies and take them out.  Customize your character and weaponry from among millions of combinations to become the soldier you always wanted to be. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
